artist: Artist: Keith Rosson; Author: Abner Smith , et al.; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.; Publisher: Valiant Death, Smithfield, Va.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and photomechanical illustration of a mummy-like figure and a police officer printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 30 pp.
title: The CIA Makes Science Fiction Unexciting, no. 2: Chemical biological weapons, CIA documents about the AIDS virus, & "cures" killing faster than AIDS!
